page.title: 03EDUCATION IN BURSCOUGH
page.content:
There are 5 schools in Burscough 4 Primary: Burscough St Johns C E (Controlled) Burscough Methodist (Controlled) Burscough Lordsgate Township C E(Aided) Burscough County Primary 599 Pupils, 23 Staff and 4 Headteachers
1 Secondary: Burscough Priory High (County) 778 Pupils,48 Staff and 1 Headteacher The Secondary School runs 12 evening classes for adults.
There are 3 Playgroups for pre-school children.
There are 2 Private Music Teachers.
The Sports Centre runs classes including:Badminton,Squash,Judo and Football.
